description.text: Attacks an enemy with a sharp dagger, healing the ally with the lowest Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the damage dealt.
description.multipliers:
ATK*1.5*0.95*1.871
                                        
                                                                                    Heal strength: 50% of damage done
description.text_ja: 敵単体に攻撃し、ダメージに応じて生命力状態が最も悪い味方の生命力を回復する。

description.text: Attacks all enemies with a giant gauntlet, with a 75% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns, healing the ally with the lowest Health. A Critical Hit activates Retribution. Amount recovered increases proportional to the damage dealt.
description.multipliers:
ATK*1.2*0.95*1.871
                                        
                                                                                    Heal strength: 30% of damage done
description.text_ja: 敵全体に攻撃し、ダメージに応じて生命力状態が最も悪い味方の生命力を回復する。クリティカル発生時、ランダムな対象に【戒め】を発動する。

description.text: Heals an ally and the caster with sacred power, grants Invincibility for 1 turn and increases Attack for 2 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's Attack.
description.burn: Extends the duration of Sacred Power granted to the caster by 1 turn and grants an extra turn. (-20 Souls)
description.text_ja: 対象と自身の生命力を回復し、無敵を1ターンの間、攻撃力UPを2ターンの間付与する。自身の攻撃力が高いほど回復量がUPする。
description.burn_ja: 自身に付与される【聖なる力】の強化効果が1ターン延長し、追加ターンが発生する。(魂力20消費)
